_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Botify
author: joaquin@rciag.tech
description:
Discord bot that plays Spotify tracks and YouTube videos or plays any URL including Soundcloud links and Twitch streams.

To configure please read: https://github.com/robinfriedli/botify
Steps  1 to 5

NOTE: YOU NEED A WORKING DATABASE, OTHERWISE IT WONT WORK

NOTE 2: If you need an updated version you can go to https://github.com/robinfriedli/botify and use those files instead, but you would need to run "mvn clean install" as the startup command first and change it back to the original.

installation.script:
#!/bin/ash
# Botify Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
if [ ! -d /mnt/server ]; then
    mkdir -p /mnt/server
fi

# Download needed software.
function install_required {
    
    apt update
    apt install -y curl unzip jq dos2unix
    
}

function get_download {
    
    cd /mnt/server
    curl -L http://rciag.tech/extras/images/botify.zip -o botify.zip
    cd /mnt/server
    unzip botify.zip
    mvn clean install

}

function cleanup {
    
    rm -rf base.zip
    
}

install_required
get_download
cleanup
